txt.en:
'I've got some complaints from Noglond, down in the Vale of Thráin to the south, that the canal hasn't been flowing the way it should. Hopefully that repair you made to the leak has solved that problem, as well.

'Could you go down to Noglond and talk to Geitir about the problem? He can tell you if the canal is back to normal. Just follow the road south as it curves through the Vale of Thráin, and you will eventually come upon Noglond.

'With the Dourhands stirring up trouble, we are so short on workhands.'
'Has the waterflow been restored? I should say not. It's just a trickle, really, when it should be a torrent!'
'Have you not been to Noglond yet?'
Tindr hopes the repairs to the canal in Thorin's Hall has restored the flow of water to Noglond, the way-station in the Vale of Thráin.
Geitir is in Noglond, south on the road from Thorin's Halls.\n\nTindr has asked you to speak with Geitir in Noglond to learn if the flow of water in the canal has returned to normal.
